# The business account that gives you more
Prospa is a bank account for businesses. Providing all the tools your business needs to succeed. From payments to operations, work smarter not harder.
[ ![](https://www.getprospa.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/App-Store-Badge-US-Black-1.png) ](https://getprospa.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/ua/app/prospa-business-account/id1505367285>)

## Products to power growth
Supercharge your business with smart banking and intuitive products. The tools you already use, seamlessly integrated.
[ Get started ](https://getprospa.com/<https:/app.getprospa.com/signup>)
![](https://www.getprospa.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Product_Spend_Management.png)
#### Spend Management
Take full control of spending with, limits, approvals, sub-accounts, team collaboration vendor and employee management. 
![](https://www.getprospa.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Product_Business_Account_Payments.png)
#### Business Account & Payments
Get an easy to use current account in your business name. Make payments and get paid faster with transfers, cash, USSD and more.
![](https://www.getprospa.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Product_Expense_Cards.png)
#### Expense Cards
Quickly issue expense cards for company spending, add team members, use online and offline. Track spend in real time. 
######  Business Loans 
## Unlock growth with access to credit
Build your credit and access up to ₦1,000,000 in credit, quickly in the app. Grow your credit rewards up to ₦100,000,000 over time.
[ Discover more ](https://getprospa.com/<https:/www.getprospa.com/loans/>)
![](https://www.getprospa.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Product_Business_Loans.png)
######  Investments 
## Automate treasury management
Automate liquidity management and earn up to 10% interest on cash balances. Set up from your Prospa dashboard in a few clicks. 
[ Discover more ](https://getprospa.com/<https:/www.getprospa.com/investments/>)
![](https://www.getprospa.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Product_Investments.png)
######  Member Story 
## Oystr uses Prospa to streamline banking and operations 
A venture funded startup based in Lagos, Nigeria uses Prospa for day to day payments, monthly payroll and more. Watch the story.
[ Get started ](https://getprospa.com/<https:/app.getprospa.com/signup>)
[ Watch Video ](https://getprospa.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/embed/Rt-jTkDff6Y?feature=oembed?playlist=Rt-jTkDff6Y&mute=1&autoplay=1&loop=no&controls=1&start=0&end=>)
[ ](https://getprospa.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/embed/Rt-jTkDff6Y?feature=oembed?playlist=Rt-jTkDff6Y&mute=1&autoplay=1&loop=no&controls=1&start=0&end=>)
![](https://www.getprospa.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/video-modal1-1.jpg)
## Frequently Asked Questions
Find answers to our most frequently asked questions. Can’t find the answer you're looking for? Email our support team **help@getprospa.com**
[ What is Prospa ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-bc2283067b5fc5fd8b51>)
Prospa is more than a bank, it’s your business partner. Providing all the tools you need to start, grow and scale your business, to prosperity and beyond. Open a business bank account in 5 minutes and discover an incredibly fast and easy way to manage your business finances.
Thousands of Nigerian business owners, freelancers, startups and growing companies use Prospa. Packed with features to put your finance operations on autopilot and give you time to focus on growing and succeeding.
**Your account comes with:**
Bank account number in your business name
Corporate debit cards
Access to instant loans
Receive transfers from all Nigerian banks
Send transfers to all Nigerian banks
Create sub-accounts
Auto-Split your funds across sub-accounts
Manage your customers
Send invoices
Pay bills
Buy airtime
Add team members
Download your statement
Add and manage additional businesses
Extra tools & features to keep your business on autopilot
Integrate with existing software
Transparent and easy to understand fees
[ Do you have a physical branch? ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-8417e7167b5fc5fd8b51>)
No. We do not have a physical branch, however, if you’re interested in becoming a member and want to confirm, you can visit our office address 65 Queens Street, Alagomeji, Yaba, Lagos.
[ How safe is Prospa? ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-3dad4e067b5fc5fd8b51>)
The safety and security of your Prospa account is our highest priority and here are some of the steps we take to ensure accounts are safe.
Requiring HTTPS on all pages, and use HSTS to ensure browsers only ever connect to us over a secure connection. We never store or log your password and transactional PIN data in plaintext. Allowing all members to enable Time-based, One Time Passwords, for two-factor authentication on their account. We never send authentication codes via insecure channels like SMS. Encrypting our database and all uploaded images. We employ additional encryption for sensitive data, like transactional PIN.
[ Is my account insured? ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-ecc498567b5fc5fd8b51>)
Yes, your account is insured up to the NDIC limit. Prospa works with NDIC-insured banks to store your deposits, namely Good News Microfinance Bank.
[ Can I open an account? ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-af2712067b5fc5fd8b51>)
Most Nigerian company registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission can open an account with Prospa. Charities and NGOs can open an account too. Please note, However, there are a number of high risk industries that we can’t take on, we will not be offering current accounts to businesses in the following industries:
  * Third-party funds
  * The holding, managing an/or controlling of a third party’s (client’s/customer’s) funds in Prospa accounts. This includes using the funds on behalf of other individuals
  * Insurance companies (incl. insurance brokers)
  * Trading of cryptocurrencies
  * Money services (such as foreign exchange, loan providers, money transfers)
  * Casinos, prize draws and other betting or gambling activities
  * Sale of unlicensed pharmaceuticals
  * Trading of weapons, explosives or armaments
  * Unlicensed trading and processing of scrap metal
  * Escort services and other services in the adult industry


[ How long does it take to open an account? ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-d14ba3467b5fc5fd8b51>)
It takes 5 minutes to sign up providing you have all required documents immidiately available. On average it takes 20 minutes for your account to be approved once you’ve submitted your application, however it can take up to 48 hours if we need more information from you.
[ Can I apply from outside of Nigeria? ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-0034c7567b5fc5fd8b51>)
Yes. As long as you have a BVN (Bank Verification Number), a registered Nigerian company and all the required KYC information, you can apply from anywhere in the world. If you are in the UK or US with the required documents and need additional assistance please email us help@getprospa.com.
[ How much does it cost to use Prospa? ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-74734b467b5fc5fd8b51>)
It is totally free to open a Prospa account. We do not charge an account opening fee and we do not require you to maintain a monthly minimum balance. What we do charge you can find below. Please refer to the pricing and billing page for more info on charges.
[ What are the transfer fees? ](https://getprospa.com/<#collapse-3c70f6967b5fc5fd8b51>)
There are standard transaction charges on outflow:
₦1,000.00 and below - ₦10.75
₦1,000.01 - ₦50,000.00 - ₦26.87 
₦50,000.01 and above - ₦53.75
## Let’s Prospa Together
Prospa is available on iOS, Android and Web. Open an account today!

Prospa is a global fintech company. Banking and other financial services are provided by licensed and regulated institutions in their respective jurisdictions. Access to products and services may differ depending on the country you are in when using Prospa.
All text, graphics, audio files, code, downloadable material, and other works on this website are the copyrighted works of Prospa. All Rights Reserved. Any unauthorized redistribution or reproduction of any copyrighted materials on this website is strictly prohibited. Other product and company names are trademarks of their respective owners.

generated_description:
**Prospa: Banking for Businesses in Nigeria**

Prospa is a forward-thinking fintech company that aims to revolutionize banking for businesses in Nigeria. Founded in 2019 and nestled in the bustling city of Lagos, Prospa is part of the Y Combinator Batch W21—a testament to its innovative approach and potential for growth. With a dedicated team of 70 employees, the company is on a mission to streamline banking services for thousands of Nigerian business owners, freelancers, and startups.

### What They Offer

Prospa’s offering is robust, designed specifically for businesses to thrive without the usual burdens of traditional banking. Their product suite includes:

- **Business Accounts & Payments:** Simplifies receiving and making payments.
- **Loans:** Facilitates access to credit up to ₦1,000,000, scaling to ₦100,000,000 over time.
- **Investments & Treasury Management:** Automates liquidity management with competitive interest rates.
- **Expense Cards:** Issue cards for team members, manage spend in real-time.
- **Spend Management:** Streamline spending with tools for limits and approvals.
- **Invoicing:** Make sending and tracking invoices effortless.

For deeper insights, you can visit their website: [Prospa](https://getprospa.com).

### Key Attributes

Prospa isn’t just about banking; it’s framed as a business partner, providing everything needed to help businesses scale effectively. They emphasize easy integration with existing workflows, competitive fees (with no account opening fees), responsive customer support, and top-notch security practices. Importantly, opening an account is straightforward, taking only about five minutes.

### Community & Growth

Since its inception, Prospa has attracted a diverse clientele, ranging from small startups to rapidly growing companies. Businesses like Oystr have used Prospa to manage payroll and day-to-day transactions, illustrating its practical impact in the local entrepreneurial ecosystem.

### Technical and Market Positioning

In the fintech landscape, Prospa falls firmly in the B2B category, pushing the envelope in Nigeria’s financial services sector. With Harj Taggar as their group partner, Prospa is well-positioned to navigate and adapt to the rapidly evolving market demands.

### Closing Thoughts

Prospa represents a significant shift away from traditional banking paradigms in Nigeria. By placing flexibility, efficiency, and usability at the forefront, it’s crafting a new financial narrative for businesses in Nigeria—a narrative that embraces both technology and customer-centric solutions.

If you're a business owner looking to enhance your financial operations, Prospa just might be the partner you need to unlock your potential.
